content: Correct, many have been sucked into the "We gottado sumptin', NOW!" I ask, "And if it is exactly the wrong thing? Then?" There is never a response. And we ARE responsible for not making the fundimental changes necessary in the Rep. and DEM. parties. They need to return to their respective core values, which are, interestingly, not that different, but COMPLETELY different from that which they espouse today.

title: Obama's Dead End
